item.title: Testing json responses in Flask REST apps with pytest
item.description: Testing is an essential part of software developmnet process. Unfortunately best prictives for python are established not as good as for example in Java world. Here I try to explain how to test Flask-based web applications. We want to test endpoints behaviour including status codes and parameters encoding. It means testing of handler functions for those endpoints is not enough. Tests for endpoints can be considered/used as high-level acceptance tests.
